Earthquake.description: Earthquake represents a seismic event from USGS GeoJSON feed.

depthKm.description: Depth in kilometers below the surface.

magnitude.description: Earthquake magnitude on the Richter scale.

occurredAt.description: Time the earthquake occurred, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

place.description: Human-readable place description (e.g., "10 km SW of Anchorage, Alaska").

sourceUrl.description: URL to the USGS event detail page.

Error.description: Error is returned when a handler encounters an error. It contains a simple error message that the developer can customize.

message.description: Error message (e.g., 'user not found', 'database connection failed')

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

GeoCoordinates.description: GeoCoordinates represents a geographic location using WGS84 coordinates.

ListEarthquakesRequest.description: ListEarthquakesRequest specifies filters for retrieving earthquake data from USGS.

end.description: End of time range (inclusive), Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

minMagnitude.description: Minimum magnitude filter (e.g., 4.0 for significant quakes).

start.description: Start of time range (inclusive), Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

ListEarthquakesResponse.description: ListEarthquakesResponse contains the list of earthquakes matching the request filters.

PaginationResponse.description: PaginationResponse contains pagination metadata returned alongside list results.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string indicates no more pages.

totalCount.description: Total count of items matching the query, if known. Zero if the total is unknown.

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

get.description: ListEarthquakes retrieves recent earthquakes from the USGS GeoJSON feed.

parameters.description: Start of time range (inclusive), Unix epoch milliseconds.
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: End of time range (inclusive), Unix epoch milliseconds.
parameters.name: end

parameters.description: Minimum magnitude filter (e.g., 4.0 for significant quakes).
parameters.name: min_magnitude
